medium: Ink, gouache and gold on vellum
title: Leaf from a Book of Hours (recto and verso)
description: Double-sided; border on 3 sides; delicate ivy leaf scrolls, flowers and face in LR; \"jewelled\" with many specks of burnished gold leaf
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
artist: The School of the Master of Mary of Burgundy
